name: com.unity.render-pipelines.infinity
description: The Infinity Render Pipeline is a high-fidelity Scriptable Render Pipeline built by Pseudo Game Tech to target modern (Compute Shader compatible) platforms. The IRP utilizes Physically-Based Lighting techniques, linear lighting, HDR lighting and a configurable hybrid Tile/Cluster ForwardPlus lighting architecture and gives you the tools you need to create games, technical demos, animations and more to a high graphical standard.
